TopicTitle: Any way to change the size of parts?

Articles.Content:
Is there any way to change the size of a part?  i.e. make an engine smaller or larger or change it's thrust?

Is a mod that might do this?

In KSP 1, there was Tweakscale, but to my knowledge there is currently no mod that allows you to rescale or change the thrust of parts and engines. A good thing is that we could ask the devs if they would like to include this, but I would recommend waiting for KSP 2 Modders to make it as someone will probably do it.
